snippet: Mary Lou Bruner, who is running for a Texas Board of Education seat, posted on Facebook that “a reliable source” had told her President Obama was once a prostitute.
abstract: Candidacy of Mary Lou Bruner for seat on Texas State Board of Education has focused national attention on question of whether there is any candidate who is too fringe for Texas Republicans; Bruner's views include call for United States to ban Islam; as member of board she would wield influence in setting curriculum standards and choosing textbooks.
lead_paragraph: Mary Lou Bruner, who is running for a Texas Board of Education seat, posted on Facebook that “a reliable source” had told her President Obama was once a prostitute.

headline.main: A Texas Candidate Pushes the Boundary of the Far Right
headline.print_headline: Texan Seeking a Say on Textbooks Pushes the Boundary of the Far Right
